评论概述: Super cute, but the posts are thicker than you would expect
评论详情: I wore these all throughout the holiday season, and they’re super cute but my ears will get sore because they are sort of standard gauge, and these posts are just a hair thicker than standard
Love the flat back, also look great.  Now my eat no longer hurts when I lay on it

评论概述: Haven’t tried but they look great!

评论详情: These would’ve looked so cute on but part you put through your ear is so short that I can’t even put them on.
Good quality. Easy to put on and take off. Stay on and closed. Do take a couple of days to get adjusted to so I would question the quality of the gold. Very pretty. Big but not too big.

评论概述: Won’t even fit, couldn’t get it on
评论详情: I wanted to love these pieces so bad because they are really pretty. However, the way that the product is designed is flawed and won’t allow you to fit it in your lobes if they are thicker. Normally, posts are designed in a way where they are longer with the stud, and the flat back is shorter. This was vice versa and didn’t make any sense.
These are nice earrings, seem well made. My only issue is that July is not orange. The color doesn't match the month selected. Can't speak to the others.

First, I have never tried this style of earring back before.  I really like it!  I picked these out for my daughter and I may have to go back and get a set for myself now!  The front part, that you see, is so cute and delicate.  The backs are nice and secure, which makes me happier that my daughter won't lose them at school.  She has already asked me to look at the company for more styles!  Also, delivery was nice and quick!Thank you for the item, this is my honest opinion.

评论概述: Holds secure and are super cute!
评论详情: These are super cute!  I put them in before bed and they were securely held overnight.  My only complaint is the ones with the dangle are a little bit harder to grip due to that but otherwise, I was able to tighten them well.  I am typically very sensitive to different metals and so far so good, no issues with these.
And pretty earring set. I like how it comes in different stacking variations. The gems are nice quality and feel and look nice on my ears

One of the best things about these earrings is the extended internal thread, which makes them much easier to screw on and keeps them securely in place.  I’ve had studs in the past that constantly loosen or fall off, but these have stayed put, even during exercise and sleep.  The design makes me feel confident that they won’t slip off or get lost, which is such a relief for anyone with an active lifestyle.  This feature alone makes them worth it, especially if you tend to wear your earrings 24/7.  My only minor wish is that the backing could be a bit thinner to feel less noticeable, but overall, the comfort and security are fantastic."

The craftsmanship on these earrings is really impressive! The gold plating is even and looks very professional. Each stone is securely set with no wobble or looseness. Love how the flat backs are perfectly smooth with no rough edges. The threading is precise and well-machined. Really appreciate the attention to detail in the finish work. The posts are sturdy but not too thick. The birthstone colors are vibrant and true to what you'd expect. "

评论概述: I love these so so much
评论详情: These are the cutest, most dainty, adorable, and quality earrings. Normally, it costs a whole lot more to have a threaded earring such as these. The design is so cute and the 3 pairs go together really well. They are really comfortable and I can't sleep in them without worry, same with showering. These are easy to put on, it does take some trial and error, but once they're in they are IN. Not only are the earrings so perfect, the packaging was adorable and they even added a little note which absolutely melted me. I would 1000% recommend and I really hope they start putting out styles in gold too!

These flat back earrings have a sleek and modern design, but the bar length is notably long. This extended length causes the earrings to dangle slightly outward, which might not suit everyone's style preference. The overall quality is good, and they are comfortable to wear for extended periods. However, if you prefer a more snug fit against the earlobe, you might find this design a bit too long.

评论概述: Painfree but a little touch to put on!
评论详情: The earrings are really nice!  I've only worn them for under a week, so the quality is hard to speak to, but so far, the flat backs have been really nice when laying on my side to read or sleep.  As opposed to the conventional long post in the front of the earring, these posts are smaller in the front and longer from the back and screw into each other.  They're secure, but having a magnifying mirror or a friend help with putting them on initially was helpful.  I'd order different types of these for sure, especially if you have multiple piercings and want to create a look.
This is a nice set of internally screwed flat back earrings. The colored CZs are bright and sparkly and they are lightweight.
